analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x410cac201ffc0e0e4c179d926076d25bf8bc5b92.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0x410cac201ffc0e0e4c179d926076d25bf8bc5b92.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid2.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/11/0x410cac201ffc0e0e4c179d926076d25bf8bc5b92.sol#89-92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid2.dividends (/unique_chucks/11/0x410cac201ffc0e0e4c179d926076d25bf8bc5b92.sol#238) is not in mixedCase
